questions.question: A column will be considered as pedestal when its effective length is less than :
Which type of end condition provides maximum strength against buckling?
The minimum number of longitudinal bars required in a circular RC column is:
In a short column, the primary function of transverse ties is to:

answers.c: Constrain lateral expansion of concrete and prevent buckling of main bars
answers.d: Reduce dead load of the structure
